sourcesContent:
import React ,{Fragment, useState} from 'react'
import { Button, Card, CardBody, CardTitle, Form, FormGroup, Input, Label, Row } from 'reactstrap';
import { Colxx } from '../../common/CustomBootstrap';
import CustomDropzone from '../../forms/CustomDropzone';
import "./AddUser.css";

function AddUser() {
    return (
        <Fragment>
            <Row className="mb-4">
          <Colxx xxs="12">
            <Card>
              <CardBody>
                <CardTitle>
Ajouter un utilisateur
                </CardTitle>
                <Form>
                  <FormGroup row>


                    <Colxx sm={6}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleEmailGrid">
                          Prénom
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleEmailGrid"
                          id="exampleFirstnameGrid"
                          placeholder="foulen"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={6}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="examplePasswordGrid">
Nom
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleLastnameGrid"
                          id="exampleLastnameGrid"
                          placeholder="ben foulen"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={12}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleAddressGrid"> Adresse électronique
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleEmailGrid"
                          id="exampleEmailGrid"
                          placeholder="foulenbenfoulen@domaine.com"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={6}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleEmailGrid">
Numéro de téléphone                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="email"
                          name="exampleEmailGrid"
                          id="exampleEmailGrid"
                          placeholder="+216 20 123 123"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={6}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="examplePasswordGrid">
                      Date de naissance
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="password"
                          name="examplePasswordGrid"
                          id="examplePasswordGrid"
                          placeholder=""
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>
<Colxx sm={12}>

            <Card>
              <CardBody>
                <CardTitle>
                 Photo de l'utilisateur
                </CardTitle>
                <CustomDropzone />
              </CardBody>
            </Card>
          

</Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={12}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleAddress2Grid">
                         address 2
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleAddress2Grid"
                          id="exampleAddress2Grid"
                          placeholder="address"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={6}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleEmailGrid">
                         select city
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleTextGrid"
                          id="exampleTextGrid"
                          placeholder="city"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={4}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label>
                        state
                        </Label>
                        <Input type="select">
                          <option>Option 1</option>
                          <option>Option 2</option>
                          <option>Option 3</option>
                          <option>Option 4</option>
                          <option>Option 5</option>
                        </Input>
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>

                    <Colxx sm={2}>
                      <FormGroup>
                        <Label for="exampleZipGrid">
                        aaa
                        </Label>
                        <Input
                          type="text"
                          name="exampleZipGrid"
                          id="exampleZipGrid"
                          placeholder="aaaa"
                        />
                      </FormGroup>
                    </Colxx>
                  </FormGroup>

                  <Button color="primary">
                   AJOUTER
                  </Button>
                </Form>
              </CardBody>
            </Card>
          </Colxx>
        </Row>
      </Fragment>
   
    );
}
export default AddUser;
